snippet.title: Heroes of Loot 2 - procedural dungeon crawling action adventure
snippet.description:
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/439880
iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/app/heroes-of-loot-2/id1114594263
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.orangepixel.dungeon2

www.heroesofloot.com
----


Control multiple heroes at once in this dungeon crawling action adventure role playing game. A mix of classic 80's Gauntlet-action and quests with influence from God of War and Darksiders


-----
Subscribe for more OrangePixel videos: https://www.youtube.com/user/orangepixelmobile

CONNECT
Twitter: https://twitter.com/orangepixel
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/orangepixel
Instagram: http://instagram.com/orangepixelgames


WEBSITE
http://www.orangepixel.net
